dialogue.text: I gotta say, I'm pretty impressed. Not everyone has the guts to stand up to a crystalline god.
Buuuuut don't get ahead of yourself.
I've been giving you a small amount of my power from a distance so you can take him on.
You really thought you could just survive in space, huh?
Anyway, I'm RJ. Shard came here looking for me, but you seem to have pissed him off enough to get his attention.
Ending him right now would be no fun, so I'll just give you some more power instead. Go nuts.
And don't worry about the girl. I warped her somewhere safe, so don't hold back.
